output: I'm Harsh Deep, a Junior Python Developer and a Python Developer & Tech Enthusiast.

I'm Harsh Deep, a passionate developer specializing in Python, automation, and web technologies. With a Diploma in Computer Science from Sheridan College, Canada, I bring hands-on experience in CRM systems, scripting, and full-stack development. I'm eager to contribute to innovative projects in remote or junior developer roles.
Based in India, with global experience in Canada & USA.

Diploma in Computer Science from Sheridan College, Canada (2023–2024), GPA: 3.2/4.0. Secondary Education in India: Matriculation from St. Paul's Convent School (ICSE, 90%), Class 12th from DAV Public School (CBSE, 80%).
2024: IT Help Desk – Wings Freightway Inc (Canada). 2022: IT Manager – Go Green Solar (India). 2021: App Developer Intern – DS Vistas Global. 2021: Freelancer – Remote Tech Projects.

Languages: Python, C#, Java (basic). Frontend: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap. Backend: Flask, SQL, Git. Tools: Android Studio, Visual Studio, CRM Platforms. Soft Skills: Remote Support, Team Collaboration, Documentation.

English Fluency: IELTS 8.0. Global Experience: Canada & USA. Customer Support: Voice & Email. CRM Expertise: Zoho, HubSpot. Tech Helpdesk: Windows/Mac. Communication: Call Etiquette. Data Entry: Fast & Accurate. Flexible Hours: 24/7 Availability. Tech Stack: Python, C#, Flask, SQL. Lead Generation: Cold Calling.
Upskilling in AI & MLOps: Python & Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, MLOps & Deployment, Data Engineering, Cloud (AWS, GCP), NLP, Computer Vision, AI Ethics, Automation.
